entry.name: REQ_GET_FIX
entry.description: from gcs to vehilce : get vid component id

entry.name: REP_GET_FIX
entry.description: form vehicle to gcs : send vid component id

entry.name: REQ_SET_INFO
entry.description: from gcs to vehilce : set active info: idCard.phoneNumber.activationDate vehicleName

entry.name: REP_SET_INFO
entry.description: form vehicle to gcs : success or not

entry.name: REQ_CLEAR_STATE
entry.description: from gcs to vehilce : clear avtive info

entry.name: REP_CLEAR_STATE
entry.description: form vehicle to gcs : success or not

entry.name: GNSS_STATUS_RTK_SWITCH
entry.description: true if happend rtk switch to gps

entry.name: GNSS_STATUS_RTK_RECOVER
entry.description: true if rtk fixed is recovered

entry.name: FIX_YAW
entry.description: true if need fix yaw during agro task

entry.name: AGRO_ARM
entry.description: true if spray or spread armed

enum.name: RADAR_MODE_BITMASK
enum.description: bitmask of terrain radar work mode

entry.name: CAPTURE_CONTROL
entry.param: trigger from which source :mission or manual
angle yaw of vehicle in degree
angle pitch of gimbal in degree
angle yaw of gimbal in degree

entry.name: AIREC_TRACK_CONTROL
entry.param: bit[0]:track function enable/disable bit[1]:valid of target id bit[2:7] target id

enum.name: MAV_CMD
enum.description: Commands to be executed by the MAV

entry.name: UAT_CMD_DO_SET_TRANSFER_POINT
entry.param: Use current (1=use current location, 0=use specified location)

entry.name: IDENTIFY_BREAKPOINT
entry.description: from gcs to vehicle,identify get breakpoint

entry.name: SET_LIGHT_SWITCH
entry.description: Turn on or off the light

entry.name: SET_LIGHT_FLASH
entry.description: Turn on or off the flashing state

entry.name: PROLAND_COTNROL
entry.description: control cmd for protect landing function

entry.name: FAN_DETECTION
entry.description: fan rpm detect param only use for result ack

entry.name: SET_RTK_FIXED_MODE
entry.description: gnss module switch to rtk fixed mode if user select

entry.name: DO_MAG_CAL_ACT
entry.description: trigger for do mag auto cal

entry.name: NETLINK_CTL
entry.param: 0:disable 1:only fpv 2:only main video 3:main with fpv 3:fpv with main

entry.name: VIDEO_BPS_CTL
entry.description: Setting the bitrate of the video stream.

entry.name: GPS_SWITCH
entry.description: control navigation use gps or vio

entry.name: DO_REFLY_BREAKPOINT
entry.description: restart from breakpoint whitch has record by UAT_BREAKPOINT_RECORD

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_DUARATION_ARM
entry.description: uat command for duration arm function
entry.param: duration of prearm in UAT_COMMON_CONTROL_ACK, 0:idle, 1:duration start 2:duration finish 3:duration break

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ALARM_CONTROL
entry.param: duration of prearm in UAT_COMMON_CONTROL_ACK, 0:idle, 1:duration start 2:duration finish 3:duration break

entry.name: SERVO_CTL
entry.description: External visual board of servo switch

entry.name: UPGRADE_UAVCAN
entry.description: use for uavcan device UpgradeCMD.srv by ota

entry.name: RELEASE_ARM_LIMIT
entry.param: 0 means allow to arm vehicle,others means limit

message.name: UAT_MOUNT_STATUS
message.description: send mount status in fix frequency

message.name: UAT_DISTANCE_SENSOR
message.description: distance sensor data use between ros autopilot gcs
message.field: Positive direction of x-axis is sector[0],each sector is 45 deg

message.name: UAT_APRILTAG_SENSOR
message.description: apriltag or other sign recognize for precland function
message.field: theta is the angle between target and the vehicle along the vehicle body x-axis
theta is the angle between target and the vehicle along the vehicle body y-axis
true if the distance offset is valid
the distance between target and the vehicle along the vehicle body x-axis
the distance between target and the vehicle along the vehicle body y-axis
Euler yaw angle between vehicle head relative to tag positive direction

message.name: UAT_OFFBOARD_STATE
message.description: offboard module state (temperature or cpu load..)

message.name: UAT_BREAKPOINT_RECORD
message.description: record mission break point send to gcs during the return process if the task has not been completed,until receive IDENTIFY_BREAKPOINT

message.name: UAT_BATTERY_STATUS
message.field: Charge/discharge cycle count. UINT16_MAX: field not provided.

message.name: UAT_ERROR_CODE
message.field: An event sequence number represents a message.

message.name: UAT_COMMON_CAMERA_STATUS
message.description: common camera status to gcs instead #193

message.name: UAT_AGRO_CONTROL
message.description: use for uat agro system control

message.name: UAT_SPRAYSYS_STATE
message.description: use for uat agro spray system control

message.name: UAT_AGRO_CONTROL_ACK
message.description: use for uat agro system control ack

message.name: UAT_BATTERY_STATUS2
message.field: Charge/discharge cycle count. UINT16_MAX: field not provided.

message.name: UAT_AI_VISION_STATUS
message.field: Ensure landing:bit[0]: Can land normally;bit[1]:Slow descent;bit[2]:Cannot land, hover alert;bit[3]:No available data, unable to determine

message.name: UAT_BATTERY_STATUS3
message.field: Charge/discharge cycle count. UINT16_MAX: field not provided.

message.name: UAT_OBSTACLE_DISTANCE
message.description: Obstacle distances in front of the sensor, starting from the left in increment degrees to the right , Defaults to MAV_FRAME_BODY_FRD
message.field: Timestamp (UNIX Epoch time or time since system boot). The receiving end can infer timestamp format (since 1.1.1970 or since system boot) by checking for the magnitude of the number.
Class id of the distance sensor type.
Angular width in degrees of each array element. Increment direction is clockwise. This field is ignored if increment_f is non-zero.
Minimum distance the sensor can measure.
Maximum distance the sensor can measure.

message.name: UAT_AGROYSYS_STATE
message.description: use for uat agro system control
message.field: true if lock done bit mask reference sequence

message.name: UAT_SPREADSYS_STATE
message.description: use for uat agro spread system control

message.name: UAT_SET_MODE
message.description: Set the system mode, as defined by enum MAV_MODE. There is no target component id as the mode is by definition for the overall aircraft, not only for one component.
message.field: The new autopilot-specific mode. This field can be ignored by an autopilot.

message.name: UAT_AG_SPRAYING_MODE
message.description: Self-developed mode switching, applied in the Q100 system
